abstract: Report in journal Science citing ability to reproduce only 36 percent of findings from almost 100 studies published in top three psychology journals polarizes community; report causes outrage among some and relief among others who are making efforts to increase transparency and improve data accuracy.
lead_paragraph: To some, the news that most studies do not hold up when retested came as a relief, like the field had “come clean,” one expert said.

headline.main: Psychologists Welcome Analysis Casting Doubt on Their Work
headline.print_headline: Analysis Casting Doubt on Their Work Is Still Welcomed by Many Psychologists

snippet: To some, the news that most studies do not hold up when retested came as a relief, like the field had “come clean,” one expert said.
